name: Lost Girl In Mirror
description:
Game introduction：

One day, when you discover another dimension in the world, there is a group of girls trapped in mirrors by dark magic. They are suffering from the torment of darkness, and as time passes, their bodies continuously transform into mosaic shapes until they cease to exist. Oh, righteous and brave gentleman, quickly embark on a journey and use your attentive and wise mind to restore that shattered world and save your beloved girl!

Game features:

Interesting challenges and collection gameplay
Dozens of thrilling character CGs
Dozens of interactive female characters, each with multiple liv2d animations!!
♥CG Gallery mode♥
